import React from 'react' import {withRouter, Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {connect} from 'unistore/react' import {actions} from '../store' import Header from '../components/header' class Home extends React.Component{ render(){ return(
this.props.handleCategory('romance')} to="/">Romance
this.props.handleCategory('action')} to="/">Action
this.props.handleCategory('fiction')} to="/">Fiction
this.props.handleCategory('comedy')} to="/">Comedy
) } } export default connect('listNews, listNewsEverything, isLoading, isLoadingEverything, category', actions )(withRouter(Home))
